snippet: Seventh-grader Ben Goodell has earned honors at a Massachusetts school science fair for his demonstration of how footballs can deflate on their own....
lead_paragraph: Seventh-grader Ben Goodell has earned honors at a Massachusetts school science fair for his demonstration of how footballs can deflate on their own.

headline.main: Science Fair 7th Grader Shows Footballs Deflate Sans Brady
headline.print_headline: Science Fair 7th Grader Shows Footballs Deflate Sans Brady
